title: language: doesn't recognize receive and de-reference in select case statement
body:
by **alexcoomans**: 
What does 'go version' print? go version go1.2.2 darwin/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?

Here's a failing example: http://play.golang.org/p/9nXPyD4ihY

What happened?

The code failed to compile

What should have happened instead?

It should have compiled
